name: Incommunicado
description:
You are alone in an arena.

Expect there is a turret in the center of said arena. This turret is looking for you. Objective: hide from the turret's light beam and reach it somehow to deactivate it.

Good luck, you might need it.

The game was made for the #WeeklyGameJam (Week 102: "One Big Boss). #WGJGame
